name: Improved Healthstone
baseDescription: Increases the amount of Health restored by your Healthstone by 10%.

name: Improved Imp
baseDescription: Increases the effect of your Imp's Firebolt, Fire Shield, and Blood Pact spells by 10%.

name: Demonic Embrace
baseDescription: Increases your total Stamina by 6% but reduces your total Spirit by 2%.

name: Improved Health Funnel
baseDescription: Increases the amount of Health transferred by your Health Funnel spell by 10%.

name: Improved Voidwalker
baseDescription: Increases the effectiveness of your Voidwalker's Torment, Consume Shadows, Sacrifice and Suffering spells by 10%.

name: Fel Intellect
baseDescription: Increases the maximum Mana of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter by 3%.

name: Improved Succubus
baseDescription: Increases the effect of your Succubus' Lash of Pain and Soothing Kiss spells by 10%, and increases the duration of your Succubus' Seduction and Lesser Invisibility spells by 10%.

name: Fel Domination
baseDescription: Gives you a 14% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling the Drain Life, Drain Mana, or Drain Soul spell.

name: Fel Stamina
baseDescription: Increases the maximum Health of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter by 3%.

name: Master Summoner
baseDescription: Reduces the casting time of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter Summoning spells by 2 sec and the Mana cost by 20%.

name: Unholy Power
baseDescription: Increases the damage done by your Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter's melee attacks by 4%.

name: Improved Enslave Demon
baseDescription: Reduces the Attack Speed and Casting Speed penalty of your Enslave Demon spell by 2% and reduces the resist chance by 2%.

name: Demonic Sacrifice
baseDescription: When activated, sacrifices your summoned demon to grant you an effect that lasts 30 min.  The effect is canceled if any Demon is summoned.Imp: Increases your Fire damage by 15%.Voidwalker: Restores 3% of total Health every 4 sec.Succubus: Increases your Shadow damage by 15%.Felhunter: Restores 2% of total Mana every 4 sec.

name: Improved Firestone
baseDescription: Increases the bonus Fire damage from Firestones and the Firestone effect by 15%.

name: Master Demonologist
baseDescription: Grants both the Warlock and the summoned demon an effect as long as that demon is active.Imp - Reduces threat caused by 4%.Voidwalker - Reduces physical damage taken by 2%.Succubus - Increases all damage caused by 2%.Felhunter - Increases all resistances by .2 per level.

name: Soul Link
baseDescription: When active, 0% of all damage taken by the caster is taken by your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, or Felhunter demon instead.  In addition, both the demon and master will inflict 3% more damage.  Lasts as long as the demon is active.

name: Improved Spellstone
baseDescription: Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your Spellstone by 15%.
